issue.title: gzweb and ipynotebook websockets not working in some versions of Chrome

message.raw: Turns out that it's due in some way to my desktop machine's proxy setup.  I have my machine configured to use a local squid proxy.  In that situation, Chrome seems to refuse to connected over a non-TLS websocket.   Disabling the proxy setting works for me.
message.html: Turns out that it's due in some way to my desktop machine's proxy setup. I have my machine configured to use a local squid proxy. In that situation, Chrome seems to refuse to connected over a non-TLS websocket. Disabling the proxy setting works for me.
